Package org.bff.javampd.admin

Class MPDAdmin

java.lang.Object
org.bff.javampd.admin.MPDAdmin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Admin
public class MPDAdmin extends Object implements Admin
MPDAdmin represents an administrative controller to a MPD server. To obtain an instance of the class you must use the getMPDAdmin method from the MPD connection class. This class does not have a public constructor (singleton model) so the object must be obtained from the connection object.
Author:
Bill
